about_the_game:
Rugged, challenging, and realistic western mountain railroading awaits you in Soldier Summit Scenario Pack 01.

A new addition in Train Simulator partner programme member High Iron Simulations’ best-selling series of scenario packs, Soldier Summit Scenario Pack 01 features ten challenging career scenarios that take you to the Wasatch Range of the great North American Rocky Mountains to do battle with Denver & Rio Grande Western’s famed Soldier Summit.

In this pack, you’ll experience D&RGW freight and passenger operations as well as Utah Railway coal-hauling duties. Across the seasons and over the rugged and scenic 70-mile length of the popular Train Simulator Soldier Summit route, you will handle heavy Rio Grande coal and manifest freights, D&RGW’s famed Rio Grande Zephyr streamliner, lug coal for the Utah Railway, and handle switching D&RGW duties at Provo and Helper, Utah.

Developed by noted scenario author Gary Dolzall, Soldier Summit Scenario Pack 01 features authentic experiences operating a variety of classic diesel locomotives, including D&RGW EMD SD40T-2s, GP9s, SD9s, and stylish F9s, as well as Southern Pacific EMD SD45s working in Utah Railway coal service.

Note: The pack’s scenarios require the Train Simulator: Soldier Summit Route Add-On. Select individual scenarios also require Train Simulator’s Western Pacific FP7 California Zephyr Loco Add-On (which includes the Rio Grande Zephyr and F9); D&RGW EMD SD9 Loco Add-On; and DTM Southern Pacific Electro-Motive SD45 Add-on. (each DLC available separately).

In Soldier Summit Scenario Pack 01 and its ten career scenarios, you’ll discover and enjoy new challenging, realistic, and dramatic mountain railroading at its best!

Included Career Scenarios:


  • Coal to the Summit
  • Coal for Carbon Power
  • Snowy Slope
  • Coal for Uncle Pete
  • RGZ West, Part 1
  • RGZ West, Part 2
  • Utah Railway Empties East
  • Utah Railway Coal West
  • Provo Yard Duty
  • Provo Cadillacs
